caption: This song features the main melody sung by a choir. This is accompanied by the string section and brass section featuring violins and trumpets. Hand claps are heard on every count. Orchestral percussion plays in the background. As the quality of audio is low, many instruments cannot be heard. This song can be played in a celebration.
